title: The Economist July 5th - July 11th 2008.zip
description:
No economist uploaded so far this weekend, so guess the great Larod112 must be busy  - thanks again Larod112 for all the previous weeks, you really have been a star - in fact your the aXXo of the audio books world, well...at least for the economist :)

Here is the economist audio edition - not had the chance to put into folders, but just uploading now so people can have a few hours of uploading it (and hopefully seeding it!) before I turn off my PC for tonight.

The audio edition contains word-for-word recordings of all articles published in The Economist, read by professional broadcasters and actors. It is ideal for anyone who wants to listen to articles while travelling, exercising or just relaxing.

I have also noticed they have got a new speaker for the economist last week, not as good as some of the others in my opinion but still not bad.

Enjoy your weekly routine people!
